title: How to climb ranked when all 4 teamates are always bad?
body:
Normal is fine...

Normal is normal.

I get into ranked...

I have an afker-
Next game I have an intent feeder
Next game I have Garen wanting to top with me instead of support

Everyone is bad.  And it's not just bad that they are bad...
They report me if I try to tell them why they are bad.

I love many accounts that way.

I have one friend who is good like me.

Rodger192

He seems to be the only other good player in this game.
Everyone else is bad so far.

He is the #1 Thresh and I am the greatest Fiora in all of leauges.

That's what I think.

It's a problem.  I'm not low elo because I suck.

I don't suck.
I was famous for my level 1 pentakills before Riot nerfed my champ.

Any advice how to climb the ladder when Rodger is gone?

I don't think you can.

I don't think it's possible to solo que and climb!

Not with my luck.  Not with thease...  "teamates"

replies.body: Toxic player, maybe you're the one who's bad.

Is this guy being serious? Sarcastic? Satirical? 

Whatever this is. It's not even funny.
